title: Schema for BSI Surveillance Audit Baustein Selection
description: Defines the structure for the list of selected Bausteine for a surveillance audit.

rows.description: A list of selected Bausteine and their audit details.

Baustein.description: The full ID and title of the selected Baustein (e.g., 'ISMS.1 Sicherheitsmanagement').

Zielobjekt.description: The target object or system to which this Baustein applies (e.g., 'Gesamter Informationsverbund').

Begründung.description: A brief justification for selecting this Baustein for the audit.
